name: Summoners
description:
HELLO THIS IS SUMMONERS! :D

HOW TO PLAY:

mouse lol

THINGS YOU SHOULD KNOW:

YOU HAVE TO CLICK ON THE UNITS TO DEPLOY THEM!

AFTER YOU DEPLOY THEM THEY WILL VANISH AFTER 12 SECONDS!

DEFEAT THE ENEMY CASTLE!

YOURS IS ON THE BOTTOM RIGHT!

(THE TOWER CAN ONLY BE USED ONCE PER MATCH)

(AND THE FIREBALL)

EACH DAMAGE TO THE CASTLE WILL RANDOMIZE BY 1-5 AND SO DOES THE ENEMY TOO!

AND ALSO THERE IS ONLY NORMAL CAUSE IM TOO LAZY TO ADD MORE MODES!

AND THATS ALL! HAVE FUN! :D

(EACH CASTLE HAS 100 HEALTH)

HAVE FUN! :D

MUSIC:
